name: First Person Tennis - The Real Tennis Simulator
abstract: 在真正的网球场上打球，面对专业的网球运动员。展示你所有的技战术技能来攀登排名。

detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Japanese, French, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, Russian
detail.app_release_note:
Changelog 4.2

- Physics improved
- Autorun improved (removed the advantage of players with big room)
- New real size racket
- Real size ball
- Real size court lines
- Added the shadow of the ball
- More camera views for the spectator mode
- Added the preset for the HelloReal 42cm adapter
- Improved the sound of the ball
- Increased the resolution for hard courts
- Fixed some glitches of the online avatar
- Removed the player's skill points, they didn't affect the gameplay
- Increased the timer to 60 seconds for the first serve of each game, 30 second for the other points
- Fixed the position of the player when STOP button is activated
- Fixed the bug that doesn't save the online score
- Fixed auto toss bug
- Fixed the confirmation panel to reset the online profile
- Fixed a bug that shows a banned player in the roomlist
- Improved chinese translation
- Bugs fixes
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3, PICO Neo3 Pro
